title: The New Bianchi Impulso Gravel Bike Expands Their Lineup
content:
The updated Impulso gravel bike really leans into gravel racing, with a hit of Bianchi's Celeste color for good measure.

Read the full article at The New Bianchi Impulso Gravel Bike Expands Their Lineup on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
